scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -c --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -n O -o build/notebook-runtime.js -- src/index.js
scripts.prepare: npm run test && uglifyjs -b beautify=false,preamble="'$(preamble)'" -c -m -o build/notebook-runtime.min.js -- build/notebook-runtime.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && zip -j build/notebook-runtime.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/notebook-runtime.js build/notebook-runtime.min.js
